description: An ancient settlement on the Euphrates river in modern Syria.
details:
The Ancient World Image Bank (a publication of NYU's Institute for the Study of the Ancient World) provides an open-access collection of images from Doura.
 

The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: near Salihiya SYR

history.comment: added related references: idai gazetteer and geonames
added related references: wikidata and tm geo
cleaned up references by re-fetching from Zotero after making capitalization changes there
Location updates and tags from Johan Ahlfeldt's (jahlfeldt) Digital Atlas of the Roman Empire in October 2012
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
added link to AWIB image set
Original orthography and references for name variants (adding the Greek variants), plenty of links to other resources, some other cleanup.
New locations, coordinates, and metadata from Harvard's DARMC project. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceUpgradesAndMigrations
New locations, coordinates, and metadata from Harvard's DARMC project. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceUpgradesAndMigrations
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
